name: Operation Wocao Activity
description: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report
false_positives: Administrators that use checkadmin.exe tool to enumerate local administrators
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4799 AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:Administr* AND winlog.event_data.CallerProcessName:*\\checkadmin.exe)`
